original_text: When Elijah looked, he saw some bread near his head. Someone had baked it on a fire. There was also a jar of water. So he ate the bread and he drank the water. Then he lay down again to sleep.
korean_text: 본즉 머리맡에 숯불에 구운 떡과 한 병 물이 있더라 이에 먹고 마시고 다시 누웠더니

sentences.original_text: he saw some bread near his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 머리 근처에 빵을 보았다

sentences.original_text: Someone had baked it on a fire
There was also a jar of water
Then he lay down again to sleep
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 그는 다시 자려고 누웠다
